name: AR Master Shooter
description:
AR Master Shooter is an exciting augmented reality game which brings virtual shooting experience into your real environment.

In order to play the game, you need to download marker from: http://www.armastershooter.com/ARMSMarker.pdf
and print it.

AR Master Shooter is different from other FPS games because of Augmented reality which makes you feel very real while shooting.

To become a perfect Master Shooter you have to pass through different levels to improve your shooting skills.

How you use AR Master Shooter game:

- Print the Marker from the link http://www.armastershooter.com/ARMSMarker.pdf
(Recommended Marker Size: 100mm X 100mm printed on A4 format)

- Place the marker on a flat surface

- Run AR Master Shooter

- View the Marker through your mobile device/tablet

- In case your phone cannot detect the marker within 10 seconds, the game will be switched to a sensor mode, so you can continue playing without a marker.
But note, in order to get better shooting experience use the marker and you will be able to change the distance of shooting and move around the area.

Stay tuned! New exciting levels of the game are in development.
